>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

 Graviton Revelation
You bend light and minds alike to see what you want them to see. When you finish meditating to activate your @Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.gXYVzmz2P3WRP9vZ]{Sidereal Influence (Su)} for graviton skills, you can simultaneously attempt a Disguise check to change your appearance without using an action. Reduce the check’s DC modifier based on the features modified by an amount equal to half your level (to a minimum of +0). The disguise lasts for up to 12 hours. However, this effect ends prematurely after a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier in which you are neither using sidereal influence with graviton skills nor have at least 1 attunement point in graviton mode.

You must have selected Disguise as a one of your sidereal influence skills to choose this revelation.
